solution_line_template: The money he earned from an oil change is ${oil_change_cost} x {num_oil_changes} =$ <<{oil_change_cost}*{num_oil_changes}={earned_from_oil_change}>>{earned_from_oil_change}.
The money he earned from the repair is ${repair_cost} x {num_repairs} = $<<{repair_cost}*{num_repairs}={earned_from_repair}>>{earned_from_repair}.

The money he earned from the car wash is ${num_cars_washed_in_solution} x {cost_per_car_wash_in_solution} = $<<{num_cars_washed_in_solution}*{cost_per_car_wash_in_solution}={earned_from_car_wash}>>{earned_from_car_wash}.

Therefore, Cid earned a total of ${earned_from_oil_change} + ${earned_from_repair} + ${earned_from_car_wash} = $<<{earned_from_oil_change}+{earned_from_repair}+{earned_from_car_wash}={total_earned}>>{total_earned}.
